law.catch_line: Authority to apply for Medicare Rural Hospital Flexibility Program -- Development of rural health plan.

text.section: The Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall make application to the Secretary of the United States Department of Health and Human Services to establish a Medicare Rural Hospital Flexibility Program in accordance with 42 U.S.C. sec. 1395i-4, as amended by the Balanced Budget Act of 1997, Pub. L. 105-33.
The secretary shall designate as a critical access hospital any facility which complies with the provisions of KRS 216.380.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 481, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 559, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998.
